title: TC001-User Registration with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using valid phone number and password.
code:
import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:8080", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Find and click the link or button to navigate to the registration page.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the help/support menu to check for registration link or options
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Close the help dialog and try to find another way to access the registration page.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Close the help dialog
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, await page.evaluate('() => window.innerHeight'))
        

        # -> Try to find a registration link or button on the current login page or try to input phone and continue to see if registration option appears later.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the 'Produtora MaxVision' link to check if it leads to registration or more options
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/footer/div/p/a').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Switch back to the original login tab and try to find the registration page link or button there.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Switch to the original login tab to find registration link
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Switch back to the original login tab and try to find the registration page link or button there.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:8080/auth/login', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        # -> Try to input the valid phone number and click 'Continuar' to see if registration flow starts or registration option appears.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input valid phone number for registration attempt
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('5511949746110')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Continuar' button to proceed with phone number input
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Input the valid password and submit the registration form.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input valid password meeting security requirements
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div[2]/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('12345678')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Entrar' button to submit the registration form
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/button[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Try to use the 'Esqueci minha senha' (Forgot my password) option to check if the system recognizes the user and to verify session creation or user existence.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Esqueci minha senha' button to test password recovery flow
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div[3]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Input the email associated with the user and submit the password recovery form to verify user existence.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input the email associated with the user for password recovery
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('5511949746110')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Enviar link de recuperação' to submit password recovery request
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # --> Assertions to verify final state
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        try:
            await expect(frame.locator('text=Registration Completed Successfully').first).to_be_visible(timeout=1000)
        except AssertionError:
            raise AssertionError("Test case failed: The registration process did not complete successfully, or the user was not redirected to the dashboard as expected.")
        await asyncio.sleep(5)
    
    finally:
        if context:
            await context.close()
        if browser:
            await browser.close()
        if pw:
            await pw.stop()
            
asyncio.run(run_test())

import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:8080", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Input phone number and click continue to login.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input the phone number for login.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('5511949746110')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the continue button to proceed with login.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Input password and click Entrar to login.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input the password for login.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/div[2]/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('12345678')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the Entrar button to submit login.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/main/div/div[2]/div/form/button[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Click the 'Nova Ação' button to navigate to the add new transaction form.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the 'Nova Ação' button to open the add new transaction form.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div[2]/div/aside/div[2]/div/div/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Click the 'Nova Transação' button to open the add new transaction form.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the 'Nova Transação' button to open the add new transaction form.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/div[2]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Input valid data for transaction: select 'Entrada' type, enter amount, select category, set date, optionally add description, then submit.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Select 'Entrada' as the transaction type.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/form/div/div/div/button[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input the transaction amount as 1500.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/form/div/div[2]/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('1500')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Open category dropdown to select a category.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/form/div[2]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Select a valid category from the dropdown, then set the date and optionally add a description, then save the transaction.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Select 'Salário' category from the dropdown.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[4]/div/div/div[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Click the 'Salvar' button to submit the new transaction form.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the 'Salvar' button to submit the new transaction form.
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/form/div[7]/button[2]').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # --> Assertions to verify final state
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Salário').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=+R$ 1,00').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Dashboard').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Visão geral das suas finanças').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=R$ 2.417,00').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=R$ 33,33').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=R$ 2.383,67').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await asyncio.sleep(5)
    
    finally:
        if context:
            await context.close()
        if browser:
            await browser.close()
        if pw:
            await pw.stop()
            
asyncio.run(run_test())

import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:8080", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
